blocks.name: cxpgt0d
blocks.content: Exponentiation with a positive mantissa is positive. (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 6-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cxpgt0d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, ccxp, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
} = {
  breqtrrd(nat0, clt, co(c0, ccxp, c1), cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)), cr))
  remulcld(c1, cfv(clog, c0), w0)
  relogcld(c0, w0)
  efgt0(co(c1, cmul, cfv(clog, c0)))
  cxpefd(c0, c1, w0)
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpne0d(c0, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cxpgt0d(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[<](c0[^c]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
} = {
  breqtrrd(nat0, clt, (c0[^c]c1), (exp `(c1[×](log ` c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, 0[<](exp `(c1[×](log ` c0))), (c1[×](log ` c0))∈ ℝ)
  remulcld(c1, (log ` c0), w0)
  relogcld(c0, w0)
  efgt0((c1[×](log ` c0)))
  cxpefd(c0, c1, w0)
  rpcnd(c0, w0)
  rpne0d(c0, w0)
  recnd(c1, w0)
}

}

blocks.name: zexpgcd
blocks.content: Exponentiation distributes over GCD. ~ zgcdsq extended to nonnegative exponents. ~ nn0expgcd extended to integer bases by symmetry. (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 5-Apr-2023.)
